#### Please imagine the following situation:

You are a teacher of a 3rd-grade class that participated in the comparative assessments (VERA-3) in German and Mathematics in the middle of the ***second half of the school year***. The results are now available, and you intend to analyze them.

To do so, you will be asked several questions below, which you should answer using the VERA feedback reports and additional materials about your class (duration approx. 20–30 minutes).
